medical_history.chief_complaint: Fever and chills associated with painful erythema and skin pustules over the left-sided periorbital and glabellar areas.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with a 1-day history of fever and chills, along with marked symptoms in the left periorbital region.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 diabetes mellitus; underwent rhinoplasty using a silicone implant 15 years ago.
